titleStmt.title: Mensa lubrica Mongom. illustrissimo domino dno. Edwardo Baroni de Cherbury [by] T.M.
titleStmt.author: T. M.
Master, Thomas, 1603-1643.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Master by Wing (2nd ed.)

Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
